cookies.text: The operator of this website uses cookies to ensure the functionality of this website and, with your consent, also for a better user experience and to analyze traffic and the way the website is used.

propertyOffers.tourInterest: INTERESTED IN A TOUR? WRITE AND WE WILL MAKE AN APPOINTMENT
propertyOffers.countMortgage: Calculate the most favorable mortgage quickly and for free

offered services: Are you interested in the offered services?

banner.text: Your certified real estate agent under the largest real estate agency in the world, Keller Williams. I can sell/rent your property quickly and for the maximum price.

services.ThermalManagementText: I will provide a solution to the needs of thermal management, from the very preparation of documentation (ZTI, UT and related professions) to the implementation of construction, warranty and post-warranty service, remote monitoring. This refers to central connection using a heat exchanger or a local boiler room using a heat pump or photovoltaics.
services.sellingPropertiesText: Thanks to my experience and services, I can sell your property quickly and for the maximum price.
services.marketingAndPropagationText: From advertising on social networks to using my contacts for relevant interested parties. When selling real estate, I invest an average of 50-60 thousand CZK only in promotion. I believe in quality advertising on social networks.
services.homeStagingText: The interior of your property as you know it! Together with a specialist in the field, we will transform the interior of your property into the best it can have.
services.legalServiceText: I will take care of all legal matters related to your real estate from A to Z.
services.rentingPropertiesText: In Prague alone, an average of 5,000 apartments are rented per month, with me you can be sure that yours will not get lost among them and will quickly find a reputable tenant.
services.webText: I will create a modern web presentation for your real estate. This service helps interested parties to make a real decision and buy a property.
services.virtualVisitationText: Interactive 3D tour of your property. An experience that gives the potential buyer the feeling of being in the property from the comfort of their own home.
services.propertiesFinancingText: I work with a team of financial specialists who can provide you with the most favorable mortgage and all matters related to financing. Nowadays, it is necessary to obtain the best conditions for financing, which my external colleagues regularly do well with clients.
services.propertiesSearchingText: I will check the legal status, the general condition of the property, the repair fund, the history of the property, the broker who offers the property, the real estate behind the scenes of the entire transaction, I will negotiate a discount and I will assist you during all inspections.
services.photosAndVideosText: An interesting video tour, high-quality photos, a view of the property itself and its surroundings from a bird's eye view in the form of a drone.
services.paintingAndCleaningText: Thanks to my experience, I am not afraid of this job either. If I decide that it is necessary, I will paint, repair and, of course, clean the property myself.
services.propertyManagementText: Thanks to my experience and contacts (foreign clientele), I can occupy your empty apartment with a problem-free tenant for a long time.

about.text1: I have more than 5 years of real estate experience. I started as a property manager in Prague, especially  for foreign owners and investors. This work taught me that the immediate solution of the client's requirements is the basis of good and long-term cooperation in the future.
about.text2: Subsequently, my life path took me to the construction department for a foreign corporation operating throughout the country. Working with designers, architects and construction companies broadened my technical knowledge. Thanks to the acquired experience and marketing strategies, I can quickly sell or rent your property.
about.text3: My goal is long-term cooperation and client satisfaction. If you want to get a satisfied tenant or sell the property for the highest possible price, contact me.

contactCard.motivationText: If you would like to get in touch with me, you can write me, call me or come to my office.
contactCard.lookingForwardToSeeYou: I will look forward to seeing you!

footer: Michal Smiga. Certified Realtor. ID: 05237891 All rights reserved.
